com.nus.cool.core.schema

Enum Codec

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<Codec>
      • com.nus.cool.core.schema.Codec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Codec>

    public enum Codec
extends java.lang.Enum<Codec>
    Codec defines the code of different data types for decompressor.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      BitVector
      Code for bit vector.
      Delta
      Code for numeric data, use delta encoding.
      INT16
      Code for int16 data.
      INT32
      Code for int32 data.
      INT8
      Code for int8 data.
      INTBit 
      LZ4
      Code for string values data.
      PreCAL
      Code for pre calculate data.
      Range
      Code for range, write a min value and a max value directly.
      RLE
      Code for sorted data.
      Set
